title: Agent Tasks and Tracking - Tree Ring System
description: Comprehensive task tracking document for the Tree Ring System implementation, outlining the progression through different rings (Core, Integration, Enhancement, Polish), with detailed tasks, success metrics, workflows, and deployment checklists.
author: William Roberts
preview: Task tracking document for the Tree Ring System implementation, outlining the progression through Core Ring, Ring 1 (Integration), Ring 2 (Enhancement), and Ring 3 (Polish), with detailed success metrics and deployment checklists.
